{"step_by_step_thinking": "At point D in the graph, there is a decrease in stomach pH and a decrease in stomach acid secretion. This suggests a decrease in gastric acid production. The most likely mechanism that contributes to this decrease is the increased activity of D cells. D cells secrete somatostatin, which inhibits gastric acid secretion.
